price: Macho hayamfikilii bali Yeye anayafikilia macho. Naye ni Mjuzi, Mwenye khabari.
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: Macho hayamuoni dhati yake, na Yeye anajua undani wa macho na vyenginevyo. Naye ni Mjuzi hakimpotei kitu, ni Mwenye khabari za kila kitu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
